title: FADE TO BLONDE 3: In The Spotlight
description: The incredible blonde actress named Rene Hire explodes into sexy action with the premier of her first big time film on opening night and she powers into the sensual and sexy spotlight as only she can. She finds her entire cast of characters around her and pulling her strings, and Nick Johnson and Amanda Hire Johnson land in L.A. to find out how wild she can play in Hotel California. Rene has sexual obligations with famous actor bad boy Colt Martin to pay off and play off, and Jacob Lenz and Barbara Dahl are ready for more but no one is ever really ready for the way Rene Hire plays out her private and public sexy scenes. Her film role is a smash that puts her in the public eye, and when she promotes the movie on television she and co-star Colt Martin has their scenes go viral over the internet and a star is born. The more Rene Hire shows of herself the hotter things get and she is just getting started, and Colt Martin keeps taking her places to see who ends up on top. Fasten your seat belts because the young blonde beauty specializes in giving bumpy rides.
author: Alvin Slater
